00015 class BDSSamplerHit :public G4VHit
00016 {
00017   public:
00018    BDSSamplerHit();
00019    BDSSamplerHit(G4int nSampler,
00020                  G4double init_z,G4double init_mom,
00021                  G4double init_x, G4double init_xPrime, 
00022                  G4double init_y, G4double init_yPrime,
00023                  G4double z,G4double mom,
00024                  G4double x, G4double xPrime, G4double y, 
00025                  G4double yPrime,G4double weight,
00026                  G4int PDGtype,G4int nEvent);

00035   inline void operator delete(void *aHit);
00036

00038   G4int itsNumber;
00039   G4double itsInit_Z;
00040   G4double itsInit_Mom;
00041   G4double itsInit_X;
00042   G4double itsInit_XPrime;
00043   G4double itsInit_Y;
00044   G4double itsInit_YPrime;
00045   G4double itsZ;
00046   G4double itsMom;
00047   G4double itsX;
00048   G4double itsXPrime;
00049   G4double itsY;
00050   G4double itsYPrime;
00051   G4double itsWeight;
00052   G4int itsPDGtype;
00053   G4int itsEventNo;
00054   
00055 public:
00056   inline void SetInitMom(G4double mom)
00057     {itsInit_Mom=mom;}
00058   inline G4double GetInitMom() const
00059     {return itsInit_Mom;}
00060   inline void SetInitX(G4double x)
00061     {itsInit_X=x;}
00062   inline G4double GetInitX() const
00063     {return itsInit_X;}
00064   inline void SetInitXPrime(G4double xPrime)
00065     {itsInit_XPrime=xPrime;}

00067     {return itsInit_XPrime;}
00068   inline G4double GetInitY() const
00069     {return itsInit_Y;}
00070   inline void SetInitYPrime(G4double yPrime)
00071     {itsInit_YPrime=yPrime;}
00072   inline G4double GetInitYPrime() const
00073     {return itsInit_YPrime;}
00074   inline void SetInitZ(G4double z)
00075     {itsInit_Z=z;}
00076   inline G4double GetInitZ() const
00077     {return itsInit_Z;}
00078   
00079   inline void SetMom(G4double mom)
00080     {itsMom=mom;}
00081   inline G4double GetMom() const
00082     {return itsMom;}
00083   inline void SetX(G4double x)
00084     {itsX=x;}
00085   inline G4double GetX() const
00086     {return itsX;}

00088     {itsXPrime=xPrime;}
00089   inline G4double GetXPrime() const
00090     {return itsXPrime;}
00091   inline G4double GetY() const
00092     {return itsY;}

00094     {itsYPrime=yPrime;}
00095   inline G4double GetYPrime() const
00096     {return itsYPrime;}
00097   inline G4double GetWeight() const
00098     {return itsWeight;}
00099   inline void SetZ(G4double z)
00100     {itsZ=z;}

00102     {return itsZ;}
00103

00105     {itsNumber=nSampler;}
00106   inline G4int GetNumber() const
00107     {return itsNumber;}
00108   inline G4int GetPDGtype() const

00110   inline G4int SetEventNo(G4int nEvent)
00111     {itsEventNo=nEvent;}

00116 
00117 typedef G4THitsCollection<BDSSamplerHit> BDSSamplerHitsCollection;
00118 extern G4Allocator<BDSSamplerHit> BDSSamplerHitAllocator;
00119 
00120 inline void* BDSSamplerHit::operator new(size_t)
00121 {
00122   void* aHit;
00123   aHit=(void*) BDSSamplerHitAllocator.MallocSingle();
00124   return aHit;
00125 }
00126 
00127 inline void BDSSamplerHit::operator delete(void *aHit)
00128 {
00129   BDSSamplerHitAllocator.FreeSingle((BDSSamplerHit*) aHit);
00130 }
